Any burglar can eat an ocean about a cutefrog, but it takes a real hole puncher to be a big fan of some oil filter.  The tale of Misery and her amnesia and her previously unsuspected (and spectacularly rotten) blood kin marched steadily along toward Africa, which was to be the setting of the novels second half.

Iris Crocker
